subject: Redstone Chambers
body:
Redstone Chambers
2-33 Smolenskaya Embankment,
Moscow, Russian Federation.
BUSINESS TRANSACTION
I have news for you in regards to the current development of my
deceased wealthy client who died in a mysterious helicopter crash.
However my client was a very wealthy investor, and software engineer
for the world's largest cryptocurrency exchange and also had many
other oil investments for over 12 years.
You are advised to reply to this email only if you trade with
cryptocurrency and I will call you to talk more or email you more
details.
Thanks and God bless you,
Regards,
Nikolai Zhikharev (ESQ)
Legal Attorney & Practitioner
SOLICITORS CO-OPERATE CONSULTANT.

subject: Re:   Redstone Chambers
body:
Hello Nikolai Zhikharev,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm sorry to hear about the unfortunate incident involving your client. It must be a challenging time for all those involved.

I'm intrigued by the information you've shared, especially considering his involvement in the world's largest exchange and oil industry. Could you please share more details about this? 

Also, could you clarify what you mean by "if you trade with"? Are there specific trading requirements or conditions that need to be met?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Clara
